page.title: 18Farming in Sth.Benfleet.
page.content: The farms on the slopes and uplands grow corn.Stubble burning in the autumn caused much trouble to motorists as the very busy Essex Way and the A13 pass through farmland. Efforts have been made to stop this. Straw is much in demand by the very popular riding stables.All farms in Benfleet supplement their income by stabling and grazing horses. Riding is very popular particulary with young girls.Farmland on the levels is used for grazing by cattle and horses.At Sadler's Farm many of the outhouses and stables are now being used as workshops by various craftsmen,who produce furniture, fireplaces,iron_work,etc.
